page.title: 07Farming in Calverton
page.content: Land use:mainly rural,used mostly for farming.Mainly grass some permanent some rough pasture.There are a large number of trees including many deciduous.There are also many hedges.There are some ridge and furrows at Manor farm and at Upper Weald.There are two large dairy units at Upper Weald. Streams are slightly polluted by these in winter.Also there is a large beef units.The cattle are brought from Welsh hills for fattening.Trees have recently been planted by farmers to encourage the return of wildlife.There is some hunting (fox),shooting and a little fishing mainly by local people. _______________________________________ __
